```{r}
Weight_tom = 0.25 #0.25 kg

tom_df<-data.frame(
  tomato = c(1:40),
  Cont = 0, 
  Weight = 0.25
)

```

```{r}
tom_df[1,2] = 100000
```

```{r}
calc_transfer<-function(Cont, Weight){
  Cont*exp(Weight/-8.31)
}

Blade_Cont = 0
weight = 0.25
conts_v = tom_df$Cont
counter = 1
for (i in conts_v){
  Cont_Tom = i
  Transfer_to_blande= rbinom(n = 1, size = Cont_Tom,prob = 0.025)
  Blade_Cont = Blade_Cont+Transfer_to_blande
  Tranfer_from_Blade = Blade_Cont*exp(weight/-8.31)

  New_Cont_Tom = Cont_Tom -Transfer_to_blande
  Blade_Cont = Blade_Cont-Tranfer_from_Blade
  
  conts_v[counter] = New_Cont_Tom
  counter = counter+1
}

plot(conts_v)

```
